entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:37 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:37 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of drizzle or flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:37 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
